titles.title: Tis So Sweet To Trust In Jesus

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Jesus, Jesus how I trust Him! newline How I've proved Him o'er and o'er! newline Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus! newline O for grace to trust Him more!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: 'Tis so sweet to trust in Jesus, newline Just to take Him at His word; newline Just to rest upon His promise; newline Just to know "Thus saith the Lord."

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: O how sweet to trust in Jesus, newline Just to trust His cleansing blood; newline Just in simple faith to plunge me, newline Neath the healing, cleansing flood!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Yes, 'tis sweet to trust in Jesus, newline Just from sin and self to cease; newline Just from Jesus simply taking newline Life and rest and joy and peace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I'm so glad I learned to trust Thee, newline Precious Jesus, Savior friend; newline And I know that Thou art with me, newline Wilt be with me to the end.
